dmca.title: Trademark and copyright infringement on messenger--uk.com
dmca.body:
t

________________________________

From: Kristy Mothersbaugh [mailto:kristy@richardlawgroup.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2007 1:55 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: messenger--uk.com@domainsbyproxy.com; abuse@godaddy.com
Subject: Trademark and copyright infringement on messenger--uk.com
Importance: High



To: The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Cc: GoDaddy/Domainsbyproxy.com (regarding private registration)

 

Dear Legal and/or Abuse Department:

 

Our firm represents Microsoft Corporation in certain legal matters. It
has come to our attention that a website hosted on your network,
www.messenger--uk.com <http://www.messenger--uk.com/> , is using
Microsoft's WINDOWS LIVE trademark and a Microsoft "Flag" logo on its
site, which confuses and misleads computer users as to an affiliation
with or sponsorship by Microsoft. Microsoft has not authorized the owner
of this website to use its trademarks in any fashion; in fact, the owner
of the website is veiled behind a private registration through the
registrar GoDaddy's Domains By Proxy program. Moreover, the owner of the
site appears to be profiting from use of Microsoft's brands by charging
a fee for the download of the WINDOWS LIVE MESSENGER 8.1 product, which
is offered by Microsoft for free.  Such use of Microsoft's trademarks is
deceptive and misleading, for it causes computer users to mistakenly
believe that this site is affiliated with or sponsored by Microsoft, and
that Microsoft has authorized the site's owner to offer its WINDOWS LIVE
MESSENGER 8.1 product at a cost.

 

In addition, the owner of the site has taken content from Microsoft's
own site - specifically, the sample screen shot - in violation of
copyright laws. See the sample screen shot shown on Microsoft's own site
at: http://get.live.com/messenger/overview and view the copied content
at www.messenger--uk.com <http://www.messenger--uk.com/> . 

 

I am writing to you today to report this egregious misuse of Microsoft's
intellectual property as a violation of your Acceptable Use Policy and
ask you to assist us by reviewing the situation and considering removal
of the website from your network. If you need to see information
concerning Microsoft's trademarks (WINDOWS LIVE and the Microsoft "Flag"
logo) in order to evaluate the situation, please let me know. 

 

We believe the site to be hosted by your company based on the
information:

 


Network Whois record


Queried whois.arin.net with "74.52.234.178"...

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
OrgID:      TPCM
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Address:    Suite 110
City:       Dallas
StateProv:  TX
PostalCode: 75207
Country:    US
 
ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321
 
NetRange:   74.52.0.0 - 74.53.255.255 
CIDR:       74.52.0.0/15 
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-14
NetHandle:  NET-74-52-0-0-1
Parent:     NET-74-0-0-0-0
NetType:    Direct Allocation
NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
Comment:    
RegDate:    2006-02-17
Updated:    2007-01-19
 
RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN
RTechName:   Pathos, Peter 
RTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800
RTechEmail:  admins@theplanet.com 
 
OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE271-ARIN
OrgAbuseName:   Abuse 
OrgAbusePhone:  +1-214-782-7802
OrgAbuseEmail:  abuse@theplanet.com

 

 

Please let me know if you need additional information regarding this
abuse report. 

 

Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned confirms that she is
authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft Corporation in this matter. On
information and belief, the information contained in this notice is
accurate. Furthermore, the undersigned submits that she has a good faith
belief that Microsoft, as the intellectual property owner, has not
authorized the site owner to use its intellectual property in any
manner, nor is the use of Microsoft's intellectual property authorized
by law. 

 

/kristymothersbaugh/

 

Kristy Mothersbaugh

Richard Law Group

8411 Preston Road, Suite 890

Dallas, Texas 75225

(214) 206-4303 (direct)
